patthana21.12:1.1_0: Nasaññojanaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā saññojano akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.12:3.1_0: Naganthaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā gantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.12:5.1_0: Naoghaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ogho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.12:7.1_0: Nayogaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā yogo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.12:9.1_0: Nanīvaraṇaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nīvaraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.12:11.1_0: Naparāmāsaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā parāmāso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
